## Code and data
An incomplete list of the things I have been working on. All code and data associated with my publications should be available with the paper, contact me if you are looking for something in particular. 

- [`nematode_global`](https://gitlab.ethz.ch/devinrouth/crowther_lab_nematodes): data and code used for our study on global biogeographic patterns of soil nematodes. Full text [`here`](https://nature.com/articles/s41586-019-1418-6), GeoTifs [`here`](https://www.research-collection.ethz.ch/handle/20.500.11850/354035).
- [`nematode_volume`](https://github.com/hooge104/nematode_volume_calculations): ballparking the volume of the world's soil nematodes. In total, there are `1337.603` Billion cans of worms on the planet.
- [`color_palettes`](https://hooge104.github.io/color_palettes.html): selected color palettes that could be useful for geospatial mapping projects.
- [`future_cities`](https://github.com/hooge104/future_cities): a `Shiny` app showing the future climates of world's major cities.
- [`preprint_layout`](https://github.com/hooge104/preprint_template_latex): to create basic documents in `LaTeX`.
